name: Devilish Guac Eggs
author: Rhonda Holtz Hill
summary: I came up with this after eating sliced avocado with deviled eggs. I made them and took them to a party and received good feedback!
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
1 teaspoon chili powder for garnish, or to taste
½ cup finely shredded Cheddar cheese
directions: Cut peeled eggs in half horizontally and scoop egg yolks into a bowl
Scoop avocado from peels and mash the flesh into egg yolks
Stir onion and garlic into yolk mixture; add lime juice, mayonnaise, and salt
Spoon about 1 tablespoon avocado filling into hollow of each egg white half
Place eggs onto a serving platter and sprinkle each deviled egg with a pinch of chili powder
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese over each appetizer and top each with 2 slices of olive
Cover and chill for 1 hour before serving
